data.title: Regional Utilities
data.meta_description: Regional Utilities proudly provides water and/or sewer service for over 18,000 customers in a large portion of South Walton County FL
data.text:
Regional Utilities Of Walton County is proud to serve over 18,000 customers. Regional Utilities provides water and/or sewer service for a large portion of South Walton County. We hope that you will find helpful information and answers to questions regarding Regional Utilities!

Water cost money. Don’t waste it!

A dripping faucet or fixture can waste 3 gallons a day. A total of 1095 gallons a year. Waste per quarter at 60 psi water pressure. 1/4" 3/16" 1/8" 1 [...]
